description: Classic chocolate cupcakes are another must-have recipe. A guaranteed winner at children's parties!
name: Classic Chocolate Cupcakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Ice by hand, using the back of a spoon dipped in warm water to smooth the surface, or transfer the icing to the piping bag and pipe onto the cakes.
